reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, stylish with its lovely button detail, and appreciate its nice quality and great fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for casual wear and dressy style
items.body: This sweater is soooo soft and the color is so rich. The fit of it is perfect, not too tight and not too baggy, just right and I used the size guide to pick my size. Just for reference, I am 5'3" and 130lbs, 38C bust. It's well made and washes great. I chose to hang dry mine as I typically don't put any of my sweaters in the dryer to dry, just to fluff them. I have this one in two colors, the green and the tan/beige and I would say they are both a true representative of the color shown. Read more
items.author: TripletMama Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Class, style, softness, warmth
items.body: So soft and fluffy, it’s thick, runs a bit larger, it’s a great for jeans, leggings, casual, and classy too. I like the way it is easily stylish and quality wise feels great. Color, I think it’s a bit darker than in the picture, got the creamy white one, still lovely Read more
items.author: Monica

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Runs a little big so I would recommend sizing down. Quality is nice and soft and seems warm. Great transition to fall piece. Read more
items.author: AG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, great seller
items.body: So soft, well made. Love the button detailing. Seller is wonderful too. First sweater had snag and replacement was shipped out same day as I told them of this and arrived in 2 days no issues. Fits true to size. Little past hip length. Nice and thick. I was shocked at how soft, I just want to cuddle with it. Haha Read more
items.author: Becca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great
items.body: Pleasantly surprised by the quality and fit of this sweater. It is thick, comfortable and not itchy. I’ve worn with jeans, but would look great with skirts as well. The price was good, I’d purchase in other colors. Read more
items.author: jessica s livengood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softest sweater
items.body: Loving this sweater! It is so soft. I love the button details on the sleeves, I think that separates this from other similar sweaters. Looks great with leggings, jeans and skirts. Slightly oversized on me. Ordered in 3 colors. I am 110 lbs, 5’1 and ordered a small Read more
items.author: Marissa R Hurst

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater. True to size, and its so super soft! It is not a thin sweater so it will keep you warm. I wore it in Canada and it kept me very toasty. Love the button detail. Read more
items.author: CH54321

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Still soft but looks terrible after 1 wash. Save your money
items.body: Update: sweater looked great when I received. After 1 wash it looks terrible. Looks like it’s been washed too many times, material fuzzy and piled. After wearing it once, it snagged and the knit pulled through. I would NOT recommend. I had such high hopes. Save your money. Very nice sweater, especially for the price! I love the details of the buttons on the sleeves. It is SO soft. It’s not super thick as I can see my skin through it when pressing my hand up against fabric. However, it’s not see through when wearing it. It’ll be perfect in cooler weather and perfect in the winter with a coat but won’t cause me to overheat when in a heated environment. I do feel like it runs big. I could have sized down a size. Although I’m not sure if it’ll shrink after a wash or two. Read more
items.author: JB

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, White, Beige, Blue, Burgundy, Black, Navy Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
